name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Katsuki Bakugo My Hero Academia Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ignite your new tab with Katsuki Bakugo live video wallpaper, a minimalist clock, and a Google search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ignite your new tab with Katsuki Bakugo live video wallpaper, a minimalist clock, and a Google search bar.

Bring explosive energy to your Chrome experience with the Katsuki Bakugo live video wallpaper from My Hero Academia. This extension features a dynamic background showcasing Bakugo’s fiery personality and powerful quirk in action. The minimalist design integrates a sleek clock and a Google search bar, keeping your tab functional and visually striking. Perfect for anime fans, especially Bakugo enthusiasts, this live wallpaper combines practicality with the bold spirit of one of My Hero Academia’s most iconic characters.
